articles.author: Megan Rose
articles.title: He helped wrongfully convict a man. Two decades later, his daughter worked on a law to make amends
articles.description: A college student learned that her dad, now a judge, had prosecuted a man who was later found innocent.
articles.content: If all goes as expected, this summer, the governor of Nevada will sign a bill that will compensate men and women wrongfully convicted in the state for the years they spent behind bars and grant them certificates of innocence.Inspired by recent high-profile ex… [+11023 chars]

articles.author: RT
articles.title: Khabib in the house! UFC lightweight king watches octagon action in St. Petersburg
articles.description: UFC lightweight king Khabib Nurmagomedov was in attendance as the octagon hit Russia for UFC St. Petersburg on Saturday.
articles.content:
The event at Yubileyniy Palace in the north of Russia – the promotion’s second on the country – is being headlined by heavyweight veterans Alistair Overeem of the Netherlands and Russia’s Aleksei Oleinik.

articles.title: Elizabeth Warren calls for impeachment proceedings against Trump
articles.description: Warren is the first Democratic 2020 candidate to call for the initiation of the impeachment process.
articles.content: WASHINGTON D.C., DC Sen. Elizabeth Warren on Friday became the first 2020 Democratic presidential candidate to make a full-throated call for the House of Representatives to begin impeachment proceedings against President Donald Trump after the release of spec… [+3279 chars]

articles.title: Two Las Vegas donor recipients share their stories in hope of helping others
articles.description: As thousands of people across the country wait for organ transplants to continue their quality of life, 8 News Now was able to speak with two donor recipients, as they share their stories to help others.
articles.content:
LAS VEGAS (KLAS) -- As thousands of people across the country wait for organ transplants to continue their quality of life, 8 News Now was able to speak with two donor recipients, as they share their stories to help others.
